products.name: Butter Chicken
products.description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce with butter and Indian spices.

products.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with succulent chicken pieces, aromatic spices, and garnished with fried onions and fresh coriander.

products.description: Cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) marinated in spices, grilled, and then cooked in a flavorful tomato-based curry.

products.name: Dal Makhani
products.description: A rich and creamy lentil dish made with black lentils, kidney beans, butter, and Indian spices.

products.name: Beef Rogan Josh
products.description: Tender pieces of beef slow-cooked in a spicy and aromatic curry with a blend of Indian spices.

products.name: Samosa

products.name: Tandoori Chicken
products.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled to perfection, and served with mint chutney.

products.name: Vegetable Korma

products.description: Spaghetti pasta with a hearty meat sauce made with ground beef, tomatoes, and herbs.

products.name: Tiramisu

products.description: Rich and creamy cheesecake topped with your choice of fruit compote or chocolate ganache.
